text:
I don't think BS supports gif or mp4, sooo I leave you a link to the moving format :D I believe it was (is?) an animation meme: "his gaze softened" and I just had to animate to it! 

Next up: lineart + flat colors

www.tumblr.com/cheesycaraca...

#animation #dnd #sketch #digitalart #oc #wip
WIP ^-^

The power couple is ready to deal with everything! 💪 The water was an absolute misery, I clearly feel I don't have experience drawing it, but I did my best, and I just love how this one turned out 💙

#oc #dnd #characterart #illustration #digitalartist #digitaldrawing #artwork #tiefling #elf

Hello! Here's a piece I did for the Character Study Zine! Featuring the polycule, having their hopefully happy ending! Ft Yxala (the tiefling), Relent (the air genasi) and Urion (the drow/earth Genasi) 💖 #dnd #dndart

Very honored to have been a page artist for Character Study, a zine for D&D characters! This vengeance paladin, Irae, belongs to @@495378. There's tons of extras in the zine's digital bundle, so go take a look! character-study.itch.io/character-st...

Lineart took ages, the coloring also had a tiny obstacle: I wanted Thilia to be in blue clothes, but I couldn't find the correct tone and shade, so I changed to teal. Next up: fear of water. 

#art #dnd #oc #ocart #illustration #wip #lineart #tiefling #seaelf

After an extremely bad February, I'm back with a sketch about my beloved couple, Thilia and Beau, partly to cope with things and to draw a new desktop background :DD

#dnd5e #sketch #artwork #digitalartist #wip #workinprogress #elf #tiefling #oc #originalcharacter

Alicia, chosen by the Moon itself to serve as its priestess, but the tragedy of loosing her twin sister made her walk on the path of necromancy in the hope to bring her back to life.
I really like her current design <3

#digitalart #characterart #characterdesign #myoc #necromancer #elf

Necromancer's next stop: lineart + flat colors. That quarterstaff almost broke me, but at least it looks good, haha. Oh, and I almost forgot about her new cape - shame on me :DD

#OC #necromancer #elf #digitalart #artwork #characterart #characterdesign #wip #workinprogress
One of my 2022 faves~ Relent, my eladrin/air genasi druid/cleric! #dnd #dndart
and some watercolors!

Necromancer with terrifying bird has arrived \o/ Seeing the process a year later, I can really appreciate the work I've put into it and the fact that I didn't give upon it even if it just didn't want to click.

#myoc #originalcharacter #elf #digitalartwork #digitalartist #characterart
Sudo, for @@84215 ! I am simply biased towards the warforged tiefling artificer 💖 #dnd #dndart

Lineart + flats for today - at the time I was pretty happy how this piece was coming together. The red scarf (a gift from her friend) scared me at first, but in the end I think it just added to her character <3 

#originalcharacterart #wip #necromancer #wizard #elf #OC #digitalart #artist

Planning to share the #artwork I created during last year (I was on hiatus), so lemme show you a #sketch about my necromancer I made in 2023, January. Alicia really needed a drawing about her outfit, but it was a real struggle thanks to how empty she feels nowadays. 

#originalcharacter #WIP #OC

Aaand finally here are the sketches for the animation. It's always exciting to look back on how messy the beginning of a project was - makes me even happier about the end result (and also horrified how much time I spent on something).

#dnd #animation #digitalartist #sketch #wip #drawing

Late progress render II - lineart only with low opacity background, 'cause I totally forgot to share it earlier thanks to RDR2 that took over my life in the last couple of days, haha.

#lineart #artwork #animation #dnd #characterart #digitalart #artist #wip

Progress render I - flat colors. 
I procrastinated working on the background so much, starting a sketch about something totally different instead, that I almost ran out of time. At least I'm trying :DD

#dnd #animation #characterart #digitalartist #wip #artwork

YEEHAW IT'S SECRET SATAN TIME, this time I got @@406615 and I picked their character Buckshot!
I had such fun thinking of a pose for this. :]
#PSS2023 #potlucksecretsatan2023

Happy #potlucksecretsatan2023 <3
I got to draw for @@4123593 on Instagram this hear, and just had to jump on the opportunity of drawing a lady Knight with her steed

#art #dnd #dndart
Dr. Galen Harvey, a plague doctor undead warlock/sorcerer- For arealflame, my person for the #potlucksecretsatan2023 ! #art #dndart
Almost forgot to post this here! My #potlucksecretsatan2023 piece for @@243041 !! Here we have lovely Siegmund and precious Siegriends!
Participated in the #PotluckSecretSatan2023 this year! My person was @@333241 with their super cute MasksRPG ocs!! Love seeing other players of one of my fab ttrpgs 🥰
My piece for @/Poisonder on Toyhouse!! #secretsatanpotluck2023

Iados for @@1691119 as part of the Potluck Secret Satan event!

— #potlucksecretsatan2023
Nova, an orchestra conductor/fencer bard! 🎶⚔️ For the #potlucksecretsatan2023 #dndart (for arealflame!)
Thank you <3

Happy New Year!
I'm excited to start posting on BS too, so let's start this adventure here with an animation I made for the #potlucksecretsatan2023 event held by the fantastic @@243041 <3 
My victim was jimbledoods on Insta.😌

#animation #art #digitalart #dnd
